attributes.action: Turn all universities into online courses until the coronavirus is contained
attributes.additional_details: We university students do not want to lose our lives or our degrees. The face-to-face teaching mode must change in response to the current situation.
attributes.background: adopt online teaching via live platform which enables online dialogue and online submission of assignments, just like what Chinese universities have been doing for the past few weeks

rejection.details:
Decisions about how to run classes are a matter for individual educational institutions.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to close universities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
